requirement: The product shall notify building personnel of equipment transport requests.
The leads washing functionality will store any potential lead duplicates returned by the enterprise system.
The look and feel of the system shall conform to the user interface standards of the smart device.'
Daily usage statistics should be logged, and accessible by the administrator.
The current repair facility ratings shall be displayed to the user.

If projected  the data must be understandable. On a 10x10 projection screen  90\% of viewers must be able to determine that Events or Activities are occuring in current time from a viewing distance of 100'
When the hit results in sinking a ship, the product shall notify the players that the ship was sunk.
All of the users shall be able to use the system after one day of training.'
The estimator shall search for available recycled parts using damaged vehicle parts information.
The system shall refresh the display every 60 seconds.'
The product shall have a customizable Look and Feel.
The product shall be able to support multiple remote users'
The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC  the system will be available 99\% of the time during the first six months of operation.'
The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.'
The product shall allow the player to position ships vertically on their grid.
The system shall validate user credentials before granting access.
NOTES: DUPLICATE: Both requirements specify user authentication validation - same functional intent with different wording

requirement: The system shall verify user login information prior to allowing entry.
NOTES: DUPLICATE: Both requirements specify user authentication validation - same functional intent with different wording

requirement: The application shall log all error messages to the system log file.
NOTES: DUPLICATE: Both require logging errors to file - redundant specification of logging mechanism

requirement: The application shall record error events in the log file.

requirement: The system shall display confirmation message after successful save operation.
NOTES: DUPLICATE: Both specify post-save confirmation display - same user feedback requirement

requirement: Upon successful save, the system shall show a confirmation to the user.

requirement: The system response time shall not exceed 2 seconds.
NOTES: CONFLICT: Incompatible performance requirements - 2 sec vs. 5 sec response time

requirement: The system shall respond to user requests within 5 seconds maximum.
